channel.title: Starting new server! Need a boost
channel.description: Hey guys I ran across this Moparscape a few days agao and it seems very cool! I was just wondering, how to even get started? How to buil;d in game, how to add things etc... any help would be appreciated thanks.

item.title: Starting new server! Need a boost
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

The Ultimate Server Guide is the only way to go

Not 100% the only way, but I recommend it 100%

Check the Tutorial Section… Suckily, we had a mass deletion, and Mod Taharok only had an old backup

I have a second version, but I’m having issues sending it to him

Read full topic
item.source: Starting new server! Need a boost
